channel.title: backup on emacsist
channel.description: Recent content in backup on emacsist

item.title: MySQL备份实践
item.description: binlog 查看是否开启了binlog mysql> show variables like 'log_bin'; +---------------+-------+ | Variable_name | Value | +---------------+-------+ | log_bin | OFF

item.title: MySQL 备份脚本
item.description: MySQL 备份 InnoDB 每天备份策略 cd /etc/cron.daily/ touch /etc/cron.daily/dbbackup-daily.sh chmod 755 /etc/cron.daily/dbbackup-daily.sh vi /etc/cron.daily/dbbackup-daily.sh 然后写入以下内容 #!/bin/bash dbs=( "db1"
